QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Rakkiri
QuestData.Description: Your clefthoof is most at home here in Frostfire Ridge, and that is where we will begin the training.$B$BOut on the icy plains, you will find a hunter of blood and death. The winged terror Rakkiri is feared by beasts across this region, and will prove a good first test for your future mount.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Rakkiri while riding your Clefthoof-In-Training.
